page.title: 02Folk Customs
page.content: As you might expect with an area which has such a detailed connection with the past,there are quite a few tales of the{Supernatural}. Most of these are centred around places where people meet,and two of the most interesting are based in local public houses. The landlord of the{Cherry Tree}which was built over 500 years ago,is convinced that he has seen the ghost of a young attractive lady.Some of his customers have too,although the ghost only seem's to show herself to men! The{Castle} is the only remaining Inn,in Ramsey(which once boasted 4),and we are told that this building has more than one spirit haunting it! At different times a lady in a black dress,a black cat,and the sound of an invisible piano being played,have all been reported;the local ale is strong!
